price: (80) So when the magicians came, Moses said to them, "Throw down whatever you will throw."
arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ قَالَ لَهُم مُّوسَىٰٓ أَلۡقُواْ مَآ أَنتُم مُّلۡقُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: falammā jāa al-saḥaratu qāla lahum mūsā alqū mā antum mul'qūna
